    • isColumnAvailable

      public boolean isColumnAvailable(Color[][] board, int col)
      Parameters:
      board - The board in which the check happens
      col - The column in which the check happens
      Returns:
      True if last row of the column is black, otherwise false

    • isBoardFull

      public boolean isBoardFull(Color[][] board)
      Used for checking if the game is over by draw
      Parameters:
      board - The board in which the check happens
      Returns:
      True if all the columns' rows have a color that's not black, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • isColumnAvailable(Color[][], int)

    • addToBoard

      public void addToBoard(int x, int y, Color color)
      "Adds a coin to the board" and checks if that move won the game or not. If not, switches the current player's color
      Parameters:
      x - The column where the coin was placed in
      y - The row where coin was placed in
      color - The color of the placed coin
      See Also:
      • checkWinStat(int, int, Color)

    • checkWinStat

      public boolean checkWinStat(int x, int y, Color player)
      Checks if the given color has won the game or not with the last placed coin
      Parameters:
      x - The column where the last coin was placed in
      y - The row where the last coin was placed in
      player - The color of the last placed coin
      Returns:
      If the current move won the game it returns true, otherwise false
